definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Aiby Lake is the biggest salt lake in Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 艾比湖是新疆最大的盐水湖。

sentences.english: The development model of Ebinur Lake region is not sustainable.
sentences.chinese: 表明艾比湖地区的发展模式处于一种不可持续的状态。

sentences.english: The Ebinur Lake region is the typical area of blown-wind activity in China.
sentences.chinese: 新疆艾比湖流域是我国风沙活动多发的典型区城。

sentences.english: The dwindling of the Aibi Lake causes the environment depravation.
sentences.chinese: 艾比湖湖面不断萎缩，流域生态环境问题十分严峻。

pinyin: Gu3 er3 ban1 tong1 gu3 te4 Sha1 mo4

definition: Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
